title: Adv Computer Architecure
description: Comprehensive coverage of the architecture and system issues that confront the design of high-performance workstation/PC computer architectures with emphasis on quantitative evaluation. Credit is not allowed for both ECE 4100 and any of the following courses: ECE 6100, CS 4290, CS 6290.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 3056 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3057 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3058 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
